businessProfile.name: Cafe Roma
businessProfile.address: 1800 Oretha Castle Haley Blvd, New Orleans, LA 70113, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1800 Oretha Castle Haley Blvd, New Orleans, LA 70113, USA

reviews.text: It was an average Italian restaurant with average Italian food. The food was good, but not outstanding. Unfortunately there were only two people working in the restaurant at the moment me and my family were there, so the service was running pretty slow. Furthermore, my stepmom ordered a Pesto Artichoke Pizza but instead got an Artichoke Pizza with marinara sauce and no tomatoes. It eventually took us about an hour to get our food, and another 5 minutes for water. The waitress was nice but as I stated the service was slow.

Five stars across the board! We ordered pasta and pizza and both were amazing. The service was very nice and the place looked very clean. We came in a little after they opened so they weren‚Äôt completely prepared BUT they got ready very fast. We were seated very quick and food came out nice and hot. If you‚Äôre looking for a nice spot to chill and eat, this is where to go!

This is my second review of Cafe Roma. I was back in New Orleans this week and wanted to try Cafe Roma again. About two months ago I went with a group of people but this time I went alone. I was the only customer dining in the restaurant but there were several to-go orders while I was there. Last time I had a sandwich so this time I wanted to try something different. I ordered a small Caesar salad and a small margarita pizza. My salad came out first and it was absolutely delicious. The ingredients were very fresh, homemade croutons were super crunchy and flavorful, they really piled on the parmigiana, which I love and the Caesar dressing was bright and tangy. The margarita pizza is one of the best I‚Äôve ever had. There was so much cheese it was almost absurd, in a really delicious way! The crust was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. I really enjoyed the addition of minced garlic to the top. The waiter was the younger guy that was there before. As before he was very polite and no intrusive. When I finished my meal I asked for the check and since I had some time left before I needed to go back to the office I asked if he minded if I sat for a while. He graciously said of course and even brought me some ice water when I saw I had finished my drink. Over all a wonderful and relaxing experience and I will be back and look forward to trying another item on the menu. Thank you Cafe Roma for your hospitality.

Food 8/10. Service 2/10. Ambiance 8/10. Cleanliness 10/10.
So we arrived to a mostly empty restaurant-they appeared busy with a hassle in the kitchen area as the kitchen is open set up. Got here for pick up @ 745. No food to be found. Apparently they gave my 150$ order to someone else.
Did not reimburse or offer any help to sort out the sh!? show situation. Did not leave until 9:10.
Didn‚Äôt eat until 10pm & they forgot the tiramisu!!! Not even gonna bother to call to complain -I won‚Äôt be back üíî
Their foods rlly good but this service is trash!
Picked up a margarita pizza. Pizza was ready and piping hot when I arrived. Service was super friendly.

editorial_summary.overview: Casual Italian spot for pastas, salads, sandwiches & creative pizzas in a modest setting.

recentReviews.text: Nice quiet place. Server was fast and friendly. Food was great.
Order a caesar salad and a chicken parm sandwich‚Ä¶ dry. I got lock jaw. Won‚Äôt be back.
Good food reasonably priced open late till midnight for take out or delivery

I have enjoyed Cafe Roma for years tho not often since the move.  I answered the questions from a visit a few weeks ago.  This review is for the pizza this week. I ordered a small plain cheese pizza for delivery, then added garlic butter and onions.  This may have been the best pizza I have ever had, really. No pictures, I ate it all before deciding to write.
Really loved it! Place and people were nice!

detailedReviews.text: Nice quiet place. Server was fast and friendly. Food was great.

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Aguilera

No pictures, I ate it all before deciding to write.

detailedReviews.author: Skyla Cross
detailedReviews.text: Really loved it! Place and people were nice!

detailedReviews.author: Yvette D'Aunoy
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in New Orleans

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Cornish
detailedReviews.text: It was an average Italian restaurant with average Italian food. The food was good, but not outstanding. Unfortunately there were only two people working in the restaurant at the moment me and my family were there, so the service was running pretty slow. Furthermore, my stepmom ordered a Pesto Artichoke Pizza but instead got an Artichoke Pizza with marinara sauce and no tomatoes. It eventually took us about an hour to get our food, and another 5 minutes for water. The waitress was nice but as I stated the service was slow.

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Stott
detailedReviews.text: Went here for Father's Day with my son. Service was excellent. Salad was really good for a pizza place. Pizza was good too.

detailedReviews.author: Sans Washington
detailedReviews.text: Picked up a margarita pizza. Pizza was ready and piping hot when I arrived. Service was super friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Lia J Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Vande Guchte
detailedReviews.text: We got the pizza as take out from here and it was very good. The bbq chicken and the combo were both delicious and had a perfect balance of sauce and toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Casey Hales
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and excellent service!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Fertitta
detailedReviews.text: Excellent üçï

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Bourgeois
detailedReviews.text: Cafe Roma Uptown location pizzas and pastas(Big Fan of the Shrimp pasta) is always fresh,hot and tasty.

detailedReviews.author: SAMONE H
detailedReviews.text: Five stars across the board! We ordered pasta and pizza and both were amazing. The service was very nice and the place looked very clean. We came in a little after they opened so they weren‚Äôt completely prepared BUT they got ready very fast. We were seated very quick and food came out nice and hot. If you‚Äôre looking for a nice spot to chill and eat, this is where to go!

detailedReviews.author: Jesenia Sepulveda
detailedReviews.text: I'm eating the romas chicken Parmesan sandwich, and it's very good.

detailedReviews.author: Matt Cleary
detailedReviews.text: Ordered take out from Cafe Roma over the weekend and it was great! We had mozzarella sticks, pepperoni pizza, and margherita pizza. Everything was delicious, and the pizzas were cooked perfectly. Highly recommend the food at Cafe Roma!

detailedReviews.author: Dee Jaber
detailedReviews.text: It's was ok pizza and salad!!!

detailedReviews.author: Bedirhan √áelik
detailedReviews.text: We had a great experience at this place! The pizza we had was delicious, and everything was fresh and well-prepared. We also ordered some takeout for home, and it was just as good. The service was friendly and efficient, and the overall atmosphere was welcoming. Definitely a place we‚Äôd visit again!

detailedReviews.author: Frank W
detailedReviews.text: So I ordered large pizza and salad. Email said 45 minutes for delivery‚Ä¶ ok fast forward to 50 minutes I call to check on my order the guy says it hasn‚Äôt been picked up yet. The reason for that is that he didn‚Äôt enter it in door dash until 8:47 two minutes after I called him. Pizza arrived cold and salad had the wrong dressing. I called back the guy said sorry there is nothing I can do about it!! I‚Äôm like that‚Äôs where you are wrong you should have had enough sense to remake the pizza you left sitting for an hour before it left your restaurant!!! Done with them!! DO NOT ORDER DELIVERY!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lakeia Madison
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious pizza and wings served right on time! The friendly, efficient service made the meal even more enjoyable. A must-visit for any pizza lover!

detailedReviews.author: Dan J
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was good when we got it, slow got the order wrong and pretty expensive

detailedReviews.author: Chef Jason Hallberg
detailedReviews.text: Ok so im going to spare doordash this review. This in no way is lasagna and definitely not worth the price taste not even close to lasagna in anyway. I could come down and show you how to make true lasagna. Italian food not close. Atleast the salad was good but you can't mess that up. This is me being nice and not rude in anyway. But frozen Sysco lasagna not very good.

detailedReviews.author: Ray Daniels
detailedReviews.text: I just went there to order a pizza and the young man who took my order, started to make my pizza with no cloves on, just nasty, I cancel my order.

detailedReviews.author: A A
detailedReviews.text: Good service and excellent food. The Lasagna was great.

detailedReviews.author: James LeBlanc
detailedReviews.text: Clean, cozy place.

detailedReviews.author: kyle ralrick
detailedReviews.text: Very nice inside, no one there but us,  good service

detailedReviews.author: Honey Bunn
detailedReviews.text: Food was horrible I could‚Äôve ordered dominos and go better. So disappointing. They need me in the kitchen lord knows

detailedReviews.author: Ms.McGrue
detailedReviews.text:
The most mediocre shrimp Alfredo I've ever had. Good service, clean establishment and lovely atmospher I must say.

I was the only person at the restaurant so there was no rush or need to be in a hurry to prepare my food.
So let's get into this dish ...
Basic at best, nothing to sing or write about and that's disappointing because eating in New Orleans I expected more of them.

The shrimp were really small and not seasoned AT ALL. You would think an Italian restaurant would offer a hint of garlic and seasoning but no there was nothing. It was just thrown into the skillet with the linguine and Alfredo sauce.

The linguine was a perfect texture and the Alfredo had a nice BASIC homemade Alfredo taste (I've have more flavor from a Bertolli jar by far). So before you get caught on the word "homemade" I only mean that it was made from scratch. Not that it was made with flavor, love, or a whisper from their Italian ancestors letting them know to put a sprinkle of garlic and herbs in the food. It was disappointing to say the least.

On the plus side the food was made fresh and the small slice of garlic cheese bread was the real MVP of my meal. It was the only thing truly flavorful that made me smile.

I had a small Caesar salad and I have no complaints the lettuce was good produce and the dressing was delicious.

I'm just disheartened to say that the small side pieces were the standout stars of my meal. For $23 I would have gotten a better meal from Olive garden (and I have not eaten at Olive garden in over 15 years).  No shade to olive garden I'd eat there if I had to with no complaints. I would definitely go there before this place again.

Maybe it was because there was no one else there and it was a slow day and the chef didn't come out to play. Idk what I do know is I can't personally recommend this place on my experience. I do have a feeling that if it were a good day business  wise for them the food might have been better.

I will never know because I will not be going back.

detailedReviews.author: Donna Harrison
detailedReviews.text:
Thanks Holly for your over the top service & the food was also fantastic.
Best Ceaser salad I've ever had.
Bravo

detailedReviews.author: Jasmine Grossman
detailedReviews.text: Never order grub hub from here. The restaurant has their own drivers who never picked up my order and so eventually they canceled my order and  I was never even notified.

detailedReviews.author: Maryanne Robinson
detailedReviews.text: Hats off to Holly, Leo and James for serving up the best meal that we‚Äôve had in NOLA this week!! I had the spaghetti and meatballs and my daughter had the chicken parm. The food was so flavorful, fresh and it‚Äôs served with an amazing slice of cheese bread!!! Great food and excellent service made this a 5 star experience!!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Williams
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza is good but the online delivery through their website doesn't work and my first order gives me the impression they are shady.

You order extras that don't come and still get charged for it. You put a tip for Cafe Roma to deliver it, but it gets pushed to DoorDash with a $0.00 tip for the driver making below minimum wage.

I checked the DoorDash app and even talked with the driver about it to verify. Pretty messed up for them to take the driver's tip for themselves.

detailedReviews.author: L. Colleen Price-Brooks
detailedReviews.text: This place and mainly all of the workers/managers, etc suck!  The purposefully turn their back to us and ignored us we were the only customers in there the cook had a sleeveless shirt on and shorts this place should not be open.  DO NOT GEAUX HERE!

detailedReviews.author: jacey spencer
detailedReviews.text: Fast service and the sandwich was amazing

detailedReviews.author: Shannon S
detailedReviews.text: Man, I have loved Cafe Roma for years. Today I ordered a $13.99 turkey sandwich that came with, literally, one slice of turkey. Are y'all having budget problems, or what?

detailedReviews.author: Whitney Breaux
detailedReviews.text: the pizza was excellent! I absolutely loved the atmosphere. 10/10 experience. cannot wait to come back

detailedReviews.author: Delma Wilson
detailedReviews.text: this a beautiful place. could be the neighborhood bar. so nice and cool in there. A little soft jazz in bar would do wonders.

detailedReviews.author: Clyde Jacob
detailedReviews.text: We have been ordering for over 30 years, and today we have had the worst service of any pizza company in the city, if not the country. We have been waiting going on an hour and a half when the longest wait we‚Äôve ever had was 45 minutes. The pizza is still not here yet. We always gone with local, but the national chains are obviously doing a better job.

detailedReviews.author: Kristine Hervey
detailedReviews.text: Amazing crust. Ordered the spinach pizza

detailedReviews.author: Addys Bode
detailedReviews.text: My only complaint is the amount of garlic on the marguerita pizza is too much

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Carubba
detailedReviews.text: Terrible delivery service.  No longer ordering from Cafe Roma.  We‚Äôve been customers for 20 years. The last 4-5 times our deliveries have been screwed up, driver can‚Äôt find address, multiple test msgs, (we are uptown,  on easy to find  street) wait time is hour and a half, and  tonight, after calling, we got a delivery notice msg 2 hours after order was placed.  We cancelled order.  Door Dash delivery is not working out for this company and now they have lost good customers.

detailedReviews.author: Mason Walsh
detailedReviews.text: The older guy that works there is extremely rude. Food is average.

detailedReviews.author: tata tata
detailedReviews.text: I have always bought cafe Roma in chalmette and the food was excellent. I spent almost 200 on cafe Roma from off Retha castle Haley. I will never order from this location again

detailedReviews.author: Michael E
detailedReviews.text: I had dinner with my family here. The food and service were outstanding!

detailedReviews.author: Logan Halverson
detailedReviews.text: Super great Italian! I work at an Italian restaurant in Florida and this was a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Shay Yates
detailedReviews.text: I had the best Alfredo I‚Äôve ever had in my life here. If you‚Äôre stuck on what to get I definitely recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Adele Harrell
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing. I would highly recommend coming here. Brynn was very attentive, and a great waitress.

detailedReviews.author: Chelsea Fields
detailedReviews.text: Ordered food that never came and refused to help rectify the situation horrible customer service

detailedReviews.author: Mike Hermance
detailedReviews.text: This place is absolutely terrible

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Albrecht
detailedReviews.text: Worst place in New Orleans to get pizza

detailedReviews.author: bunny rieken
detailedReviews.text:
Food 8/10. Service 2/10. Ambiance 8/10. Cleanliness 10/10.
So we arrived to a mostly empty restaurant-they appeared busy with a hassle in the kitchen area as the kitchen is open set up. Got here for pick up @ 745. No food to be found. Apparently they gave my 150$ order to someone else.
Did not reimburse or offer any help to sort out the sh!? show situation. Did not leave until 9:10.
Didn‚Äôt eat until 10pm & they forgot the tiramisu!!! Not even gonna bother to call to complain -I won‚Äôt be back üíî
Their foods rlly good but this service is trash!

detailedReviews.author: Kirstie My
detailedReviews.text:
Went yesterday and was ignored by server who walked past us several times without a ‚Äúhi, I‚Äôll be right over.‚Äù An older grumpy looking man behind the counter also ignored us. There was ONE table with to-go boxes leaving so this place was NOT crowded. It was basically EMPTY besides us. We were about to leave when the frazzled server acknowledged us.

Food came without utensils or napkins‚Ä¶just basic restaurant and customer service is lacking here. We only came bc Cafe Reconcile which has STUDENT workers was packed and couldn‚Äôt seat us. I see why this place is empty.

We didn‚Äôt feel welcomed and won‚Äôt be returning. I don‚Äôt think they like minorities here even though they‚Äôre on ORETHA CASTLE HALEY STREET!!

Was not worth the $$$.

detailedReviews.author: Kristel E
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza & Service

detailedReviews.author: Kellen ‚Äúsexy nicki minage‚Äù Phillips
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely one of the best Italian restaurants we've been to. This gem was an unexpected spot for us. One guy worked both front and back of the house and he got our food to us within 10 minutes.

detailedReviews.author: R P
detailedReviews.text: We came right at 11 for lunch and were promptly greeted and taken to a table. We received our motz sticks and salad with in minutes of ordering. Then our pasta came out maybe 10 minutes later, piping hot. The portions are huge, I regret getting an appetizer because I couldn't finish my pasta. If we were locals, this would quickly have become our regular spot!

detailedReviews.author: Sally Sands
detailedReviews.text: Do not order from this place. They do not personally deliver and blame everything on UBER. We never recived our order.  Many other choices.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Freeman
detailedReviews.text: One of the most rude and worst places to eat in NOLA. Stay away.

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Shubert
detailedReviews.text: Been getting take out from here since 2015, never disappoints. The shrmip fettuccine alfredo is wonderful. I highly recommend checking this place out.

detailedReviews.author: orlando ::
detailedReviews.text: Este fue el primer restaurante que probamos en nueva Orleans. La comida est√° muy rica pero sirven much√≠simo as√≠ que si traes poca hambre pide un appetizer ya que son un plato fuerte normal. La mesera fue muy amable y el servicio fue r√°pido no tuvimos que esperar nada.

detailedReviews.author: Jay Suthar
detailedReviews.text: The food and service were excellent, but unfortunately, the bar was closed, leading to a lack of alcoholic beverages. The ambiance leaned towards take-out, impacting the overall dine-in atmosphere. Overall a 3 star experience

detailedReviews.author: BM1 M
detailedReviews.text: This review is based on the fact I haven't been here in years. But loved it back then I hope the same. Decent prices for good food

detailedReviews.author: Ezra Adair
detailedReviews.text: I just recently moved to Nola and so far this is the best pizza/pasta joint in town!!! Kind of expensive but worth it

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Wayne
detailedReviews.text: Pasta was very bland.

detailedReviews.author: Leah LaRue
detailedReviews.text: This is my second review of Cafe Roma. I was back in New Orleans this week and wanted to try Cafe Roma again. About two months ago I went with a group of people but this time I went alone. I was the only customer dining in the restaurant but there were several to-go orders while I was there. Last time I had a sandwich so this time I wanted to try something different. I ordered a small Caesar salad and a small margarita pizza. My salad came out first and it was absolutely delicious. The ingredients were very fresh, homemade croutons were super crunchy and flavorful, they really piled on the parmigiana, which I love and the Caesar dressing was bright and tangy. The margarita pizza is one of the best I‚Äôve ever had. There was so much cheese it was almost absurd, in a really delicious way! The crust was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. I really enjoyed the addition of minced garlic to the top. The waiter was the younger guy that was there before. As before he was very polite and no intrusive. When I finished my meal I asked for the check and since I had some time left before I needed to go back to the office I asked if he minded if I sat for a while. He graciously said of course and even brought me some ice water when I saw I had finished my drink. Over all a wonderful and relaxing experience and I will be back and look forward to trying another item on the menu. Thank you Cafe Roma for your hospitality.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Mascar
detailedReviews.text: What a shame. After ordering food via the Uber eats app, I was firstly told the order would be late. I was hoping the wait for the lasagne would be worth it. After opening the delivery I honestly though a cat had thrown up. I appreciate deliveries can be difficult and the roads in New Orleans are bad, but food needs to look a little bit appetising. Maybe the taste will make up for it. No taste. It was so bland. Like tomato sauce and some flat pasta. The nam bread style garlic bread was tasteless. I guess my quest for a decent lasagne continues. It‚Äôs impossible to leave a review on Uber eats app so here it is.

detailedReviews.author: Michael McFadden
detailedReviews.text:
Probably one of the best pizza's I have had in a very long time. Steady stream of people picking up take out orders, so it seems to have a good reputation.
Does not appear to have dining in, even though the tables and chairs are present.

detailedReviews.author: alicia
detailedReviews.text:
Went around 9pm on a Saturday and it was mostly empty. Sat down,
Got mozzarella sticks that were very mid and frozen prepared in the fryer. 2/5. I ordered lasagna, which came with cesar salad and garlic cheese bread, my sister got shrimp alfredo with salad and garlic cheese bread. The cesar salad was okay, better if they used  real parmesean grated cheese or flakes. The lasagna was cold two bites into eating it. My sisters alfredo was the best thing we ate. It was garlicky, good, hot, generous with shrimp, and a good portion. I sent my lasagna back and ate her pasta with her. Should have gotten a pizza. Also they were short staffed and it took forever to get the check.

detailedReviews.author: Cristian Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Just finished lunch here. From the Caesar salad to the dessert, the food has been delicious!! Zack has been an awesome and great host! Def recommend!! üòå

detailedReviews.author: Eric Zeff
detailedReviews.text:
Hungry at Lunchtime, google maps shows me Cafe Roma is 5 mins away. Drive over, walk in, cool & dark interior - earth tones. Italian music wafting over the smells of an Italian Kitchen. I study the menu, order a Meatball Sammy for lunch - and end up ordering a Med Combo Pizza for Dinner as well. Who wants to cook on a Friday? Work is over, the week is done, I have some Baseball Play-off games to watch. ‚öæÔ∏è

First time here, but definitely not my last. The sourdough roll was sublime and perfect in my opinion for the sandwich ü•™ Pizza was AMAZING lots of ingredients in every bite!! üçïüòã Thx Cafe Roma...

detailedReviews.author: Chris Montegut
detailedReviews.text: Wanted feta cheese rolls. Really disappointed . Meatball sandwich was good. Could have had more sauce and cheese. really nice place.

detailedReviews.author: motomego80
detailedReviews.text: FYI. This place has paid Uber Eats to create a alter ego restaurant rebranded with a different name, Penne Place, with identical menu items that costs more money. Why would any business do this? Perhaps Uber Eats solicited them with the idea to boost business to justify the steep percentage Uber Eats charges the restaurant on sales. Whatever the reason is, it‚Äôs deceiving the customer and more people need to be aware this is happening. The Italian Pie was the first place I noticed electing to do this, but i wasn‚Äôt as bothered because I don‚Äôt like their food anyway. When Cafe Roma (which I actually liked) did the same, I felt it was important for other people to know to make their dining choices more ‚Äúinformed‚Äù from the deceitful practices this business chooses to participate in.

detailedReviews.author: Jan Wagner
detailedReviews.text: Birthday dinner was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Rhiannon Spaziano (RhiannonWytch)
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious, and fresh! Izabella was our server, it was her first day and she was excellent! Friendly and courteous. We will definitely be back when we are in NOLA

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.9/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the excellent and friendly service, highlighting the attentive and welcoming staff. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza is frequently described as delicious and perfectly balanced, with specific mentions of the BBQ chicken and combo pizzas. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The ambiance is noted as a nice and quiet place to enjoy a meal, making it a great spot to relax and dine. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

It eventually took us about an hour to get our food, and another 5 minutes for water. The waitress was nice but as I stated the service was slow.

neutral.author: Dee Jaber
neutral.text: It's was ok pizza and salad!!!

neutral.author: Dan J
neutral.text: Pizza was good when we got it, slow got the order wrong and pretty expensive

I called back the guy said sorry there is nothing I can do about it!! I‚Äôm like that‚Äôs where you are wrong you should have had enough sense to remake the pizza you left sitting for an hour before it left your restaurant!!! Done with them!! DO NOT ORDER DELIVERY!!!

negative.text: Ok so im going to spare doordash this review. This in no way is lasagna and definitely not worth the price taste not even close to lasagna in anyway. I could come down and show you how to make true lasagna. Italian food not close. Atleast the salad was good but you can't mess that up. This is me being nice and not rude in anyway. But frozen Sysco lasagna not very good.
